definitions.definition: The difference between the dimension of a space and the dimension of a given subspace of the first one.
A scope that indicates another variable of the same name and type is assigned to the local memory of each image.

main_definition: ( mathematics ) The difference between the dimension of a space and the dimension of a given subspace of the first one.
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) A scope that indicates another variable of the same name and type is assigned to the local memory of each image.
